item.title: Comment on The culture that is Washington, D.C. by Hadur
item.description:
I've been to the Capital Grille in Washington DC to celebrate the birthday of a friend of mine who was literally working for the Koch Brothers - directly for them, not indirectly like Tyler. Great food, astronomical price tag. I realized that since I did not have an expense account I was not the target audience and I haven't been back since.

If I were a campaign donor of any political stripe I would be furious that my donation dollars were being spent at an overpriced location like the Capital Grille and not on infrastructure or GOTV efforts in swing states.

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/09/the-culture-that-is-washington-d-c-2.html?commentID=160817983
